name: Fox Defender
description:
In this game you should click on TILES to protect your little foxes from the BIG Projectiles, that are falling down on them! 

There is only windows .exe file to download and play!

Assets we used in this project:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/rpg-medieval-themes...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/ultimate-10-shaders-168611

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-soldiers-mini-music-pac...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/sweet-land-gui-208285

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/free-low-poly-n...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/battle-wiz...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/toon-fox-183005
